tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage

definition.text: Can not read property 'direction' of undefined. What is that all about?

paragraphs.text: This is the proper procedure to unpack an error message and understand what it is about:
You know when the error happened. Keep that in mind, as the error is solely related to the candle where it happened!

You know which node caused the error. It is likely the definition in the node that caused the error, either due to the code in the associated Javascript Node (if it's a condition), the formula (if it's a Formula node), or the node's configuration.
You know the error message. Read it carefully and make the connection with the two previous clues!
